open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Allotments, community gardens and city farms
Outdoor sports facilities incl school playing fields

protected_spaces_details.description: Provision for children and young people

description: Redevelopment of site to provide 65 dwellings comprising 7, four-bedroom houses, 40, three-bedroom houses, 3, two-bedroom flats, 2, one-bedroom flats and 13, one-bedroom 'Supported Housing' units (including warden's studio) with associated access roads, car and cycle parking, children's play space and landscaping works, (involving demolition of No. 119 Minet Drive.
